abstract: Markets make slight gains following day of choppy trading, spurred on by late rise in technology stocks.
lead_paragraph: Investors were confronted with a mix of corporate and economic news as health care shares fell and technology and airline stocks rose.
snippet: Investors were confronted with a mix of corporate and economic news as health care shares fell and technology and airline stocks rose.

headline.main: Market Ticks Up on Gains by Technology Companies and Airlines
headline.print_headline: Shares Inch Higher After Tech-Driven Rally
